name: victor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the winner of a game, competition, election, war, etc.: The victor in/of the 1960 US presidential election was John F. Kennedy.

the one who wins a competition, election, war, etc.: The victor in the 1996 presidential election was Bill Clinton.
